goal.ch: 線性代數為資通訊研究領域之基礎數學之一，授課內容期能引導學生理解線性代數基本學理、定理證明及應用方向，奠定學生爾後論文研究或修習高階課程之所需。
goal.en: Linear Algebra is one of basic mathematic courses for engineering students. The goal of this course is to help students master the basic concepts and skills of the linear algebra that will be helpful in their research.
